pullrequest.title: Save models' material and meshes when logging targeting gazebo7

content.raw:
for testing, launch gazebo with the following arguments:

~~~
gazebo --verbose -r --record_resources`
~~~

insert models, move them around, etc, then close gazebo

The state.log file, models, and other resources should be stored in `~/.gazebo/log/<timestamped_dir>/gzserver/`
content.html:
for testing, launch gazebo with the following arguments:

gazebo --verbose -r --record_resources`

insert models, move them around, etc, then close gazebo

The state.log file, models, and other resources should be stored in ~/.gazebo/log/<timestamped_dir>/gzserver/
